item.title: Black Lives Matter at School is a national coalition organizing...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Black Lives Matter at School is a national coalition organizing for racial justice in education. We encourage all educators, students, parents, unions, and community organizations to join our annual week of action during the first week of February each year.​ This event will give us the opportunity to advocate and raise awareness on those in the community carrying the four demands as we continue the work in solidarity!

#BlackLivesMatter #BlackEducationIsRevolutionary #BLMAtSchoolWeek #blackhistorymonth2021

FRI, FEB 5 AT 5:00 PM MST

#BlackLivesMatter @ School Celebration

Online Event34 people interested

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Shadae JenkinsThis month I want y’all to learn how to believe black women the first damn time Ghetto Black Women...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Shadae Jenkins

This month I want y’all to learn how to believe black women the first damn time

Ghetto Black Women
Black Women with multiple children and baby daddies
Educated ...black women
Dropout black women
Vocation trained black women
Straight black women
Gay black women
Trans black women
Alternative black women
Nerdy black women
Hood black women
Suburban black women

Believe them. Practice beliving them this month so it becomes a permanent thing. Practice believing them before they post up or release 3,000 pieces of proof that they are right.

Thanks for coming to my TED talk

item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: ***Call for Action*** Despite public health consensus, Governor...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

***Call for Action***

Despite public health consensus, Governor Polis removed people in prison from the vaccine plan. He must stop the dangerous, political game he is playing with the lives of incarcerated people. Refusing to implement a prison vaccine plan will exacerbate COVID-19 suffering and its unequal impact on BIPOC communities. Over half the state’s prison population — 8,000 and counting — have been infected, with 28 deaths. Coloradans demand policies which value lives and achieve racial equity. Contact the Governor: acluco.org/Vaccine

item.title: Shocking. It’s like #CounselorsNotCops but with less...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Shocking.

It’s like #CounselorsNotCops but with less seasoning.

DPD Chief Pazen, who is fond of the STAR program, says it frees up officers to do their jobs: fight crime.

denverite.com

In the first six months of health care professionals replacing police officers, no one they encountered was arrested

DPD Chief Pazen, who is fond of the STAR program, says it frees up officers to do their jobs: fight crime.DPD Chief Pazen, who is fond of the STAR program, says it frees up officers to do their jobs: fight crime.

item.title: MESSAGE:
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

MESSAGE:

Seeding Sovereignty

As mutual aid workers we know that often times addiction is the result of centuries of colonial trauma. Some coping is cheaper and easier to access, why is that...? And we know that the medical industrial complex never considered colonization as a health determinant. Until Indigenous peoples’ trauma can be acknowledged and central in care work, communities will continue to suffer from addiction. But also... honoring agency and autonomy means that it doesn’t matter the conditions, everyone deserves a home, food, water, and whatever it takes to keep them alive and comfortable.

Art from @deardarlingdesignstudio

Image ID:
Over a light pink background, text in a groovy retro font reads, “People don’t need to be sober to deserve food, shelter and kindness.”

See More

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Casa de PazNATIVE FRENCH SPEAKER SEEKING LIVE IN NANNY/ELDER CARE POSITION DENVER A lovely mother and 7 year old...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Casa de Paz

NATIVE FRENCH SPEAKER SEEKING LIVE IN NANNY/ELDER CARE POSITION DENVER

A lovely mother and 7 year old daughter from Burkina Faso seeking live in position caring... for your child or children or elderly relative. Bilingual. Native French speakers. Legally in US seeking asylum.

- Has been caregiver for developmentally delayed adult for 9 months. Family is moving out of state.
- CPR/First Aid certification
- Experience with children
- Light housekeeping and meal preparation
- Does not have car
- Excellent references
- Daughter enrolled in DPS schools
- Availability date is flexible.

Please contact Melanie Turner 720.308.9414 for more info!

See More

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...

coloradogives.org
